Superior building system which we provide a highly insulated super strong building envelope made up of roof panels, wall panels and windows.

Decreased build times.

The future of Sustainable homes with increased star ratings, lower running costs.

Flat pack home able to be transported in trucks and containers.

Modern flexible designs to choose from which are comfortable and healthy to live in.

Building system which easily fits to any sort of build required.

Factory driven process with the highest of quality control.

Company built on respect confidence efficiency to make it an enjoyable process.

Wall panels contain the frame and external cladding and can contain internal cladding as well, windows slide in easy while the roof panels sit straight on top.The building is then locked up.

Tread lightly incorporate plants into your home with a green houses controlling air circulation with HRV units. Healthy homes are happy homes.

What We Offer

  • Superior building envelope
  • Structural insulated wall panels
  • Structural insulated roof panels
  • Windows and doors
  • Quotation given with in 10 days

 

  • Package is delivered to site
  • Wall panels and roof panel system which simplifies the building process, we provide the best light weight insulated building system at a very affordable price

 

  • Finally a environmentally friendly building system that reduces energy requirements and uses low embodied energy building products
  • With massive buying power savings can be passed on to the client
  • Build times reduced dramatically with increased numbers
